code: public synchronized String get() {     if (!dirty) {         return expression.toString().     }     expression = new StringBuilder("JMSCorrelationID='").     if (correlationIds.size() == 0) {         // no id's so use a dummy to select nothing         expression.append("CamelDummyJmsMessageSelector'").     } else {         boolean first = true.         for (String value : correlationIds) {             if (!first) {                 expression.append(" OR JMSCorrelationID='").             }             expression.append(value).append("'").             if (first) {                 first = false.             }         }     }     String answer = expression.toString().     dirty = false.     return answer. }
public void onPut(String key) {     dirty = true.     correlationIds.add(key). }
public void onRemove(String key) {     dirty = true.     correlationIds.remove(key). }
public void onEviction(String key) {     dirty = true.     correlationIds.remove(key). }
